Consideration 7: Explore the idea of self-paced learning.

The adoption of self-paced learning methodologies nurtures independence and places the learner at the forefront of their educational journey.

In self-paced learning, digital tools empower students to advance at a comfortable rhythm and chart their unique educational paths.

However, such freedom still requires very strong structured guidance from educators, as students can easily experience feelings of abandonment when left with content that is too challenging for them.

Tip: Employ digital games or gamified learning experiences to create an engaging and adaptable learning atmosphere that encourages students to learn at their own pace.

It;s important to observe student engagement and assess whether the gamified activities genuinely contribute to their educational growth and evolution as learners.
